item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Tuesday, April 1, 2025 at 9:15 PM UTC
item.description:
1. A man powers home for eight years using a thousand old laptop batteries (289 points | 164 comments)
2. Electron band structure in germanium, my ass (611 points | 253 comments)
3. Bletchley code breaker Betty Webb dies aged 101 (276 points | 44 comments)
4. Show HN: Zig Topological Sort Library for Parallel Processing (56 points | 22 comments)
5. The Myst Graph: A New Perspective on Myst (107 points | 22 comments)
6. Hightouch (YC S19) Is Hiring Front End Engineers ( | hide)
7. Dave Täht has died (59 points | 11 comments)
8. Generate autounattend.xml files for Windows 10/11 (75 points | 23 comments)
9. Show HN: Qwen-2.5-32B is now the best open source OCR model (50 points | 10 comments)
10. Systems Correctness Practices at AWS: Leveraging Formal and Semi-Formal Methods (98 points | 26 comments)
11. Show HN: Nue – Apps lighter than a React button (631 points | 458 comments)
12. RubyUI (Former PhlexUI): Ruby Gem for RubyUI Components (85 points | 18 comments)
13. How Silica Gel Took Over the World (55 points | 43 comments)
14. The April Fools joke that might have got me fired (370 points | 187 comments)
15. Excitable cells (242 points | 39 comments)
16. Cuneiforms: New digital tool for translating ancient texts (9 points | 2 comments)
17. Launch HN: ASim (YC S21) – Mobile app that generates mobile apps (37 points | 27 comments)
18. Show HN: Terminal dashboard that throttles my PC during peak electricity rates (63 points | 50 comments)
19. Debts, Tech and Otherwise (25 points | 8 comments)
20. Show HN: Duolingo-style exercises but with real-world content like the news (386 points | 155 comments)
21. Camelgate NPM Outage (Cloudflare) (71 points | 17 comments)
22. How AI is creating a rift at McKinsey, Bain, and BCG (28 points | 15 comments)
23. US Marines to get high-speed, radar-evading electric seagliders for rescue ops (113 points | 74 comments)
24. Show HN: Make SVGs interactive in React with 1 line (9 points | 4 comments)
25. Chess324 – A Chess Variant to Reduce Draws (24 points | 38 comments)
26. CERN scientists find evidence of quantum entanglement in sheep (246 points | 85 comments)
27. A deliberate practice app for guitar players who want to level up (412 points | 128 comments)
28. Go Optimization Guide (430 points | 131 comments)
29. Why F#? (290 points | 259 comments)
30. Experimental Tauri Verso Integration (118 points | 35 comments)
